## Bye class

A request to end a [Session](./sip.js.session.md) (incoming BYE).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Bye 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `Bye` class.

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [request](./sip.js.bye.request.md) |  | <code>IncomingRequestMessage</code> | Incoming BYE request message. |
